name: Fish Chef (Poissonier)
description: Primary Task: Prepare and cook vegetables and starches They may also be responsible for some soups and egg dishes.

name: Vegetable Chef (Entremetier)
description: Primary Task: Prepare and cook vegetables and starches They may also be responsible for some soups and egg dishes.

name: Meat Chef (Rotisseur, Roast Chef)
description: Primary Task: Prepare and cook meats by roasting, braising, broiling, or other methods They may also be in charge of obtaining the meat from local suppliers and retailers.

name: Pantry Chef (Garde Manger)
description: Primary Task: Preparing cold food items like salads, cold cuts, hors dâ€™oeuvres, and dressings They will also be responsible for setting up buffet lines and adding centerpieces for an upscale presentation that may include carved and molded ice or fruits.

name: Fry Chef (Friturier)
description: Primary Task: Cook foods that need to be fried They are mainly needed in fast food establishments.

name: Grill Chef (Grillardin)
description: Primary Task: Cook foods that need to be grilled They will generally grill meats and sometimes vegetables.
